All individual bank account holders, whether single or joint account status, in the age group 18-70 years, are eligible to join the PMSBY scheme. In case the individual holds multiple accounts in multiple banks then he will be allowed to join the scheme through one bank account only. In the case of joint account holders, all the holders will be allowed to join the scheme. NRI’s can also join the scheme; however, in the event of a claim arising, the beneficiary/ nominee will be paid in Indian currency only.
The premium amount is Rs.12 per annum per member
